reasoning_log: The matching process involved identifying unique functional areas described in the text and locating the corresponding visual evidence in the images. Desc_5 (Rooftop Terrace) was uniquely identified by Image_5 (large outdoor space with metal awning). Desc_4 (Utility Balcony) was uniquely identified by Image_4 (washing machine and large window). Desc_1 (Bedroom) was clearly Image_1 (mattress, AC, curtains). Desc_2 (Living Area) was identified as Image_2 due to the presence of a TV, small refrigerator, and storage cabinet, fulfilling the 'basic appliances' tag. Finally, Desc_3 (Overall Studio View) was matched to Image_3, which provides a wider perspective showing the sleeping area connected to the bathroom entrance, consistent with the 'overall view' and 'slightly long and narrow' layout tags. All matches were highly confident and mutually exclusive.

matching_result_list.evidence: Image shows a sleeping area (mattress) with an air conditioner and large windows with curtains, confirming '臥室' (Bedroom) and '採光佳' (Good lighting).

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光佳(單面大窗戶), 可通風(有可開啟窗戶與冷氣), 格局方正(床位區域無突角), 基本家具附贈(已有床墊與冷氣), 牆面乾淨(白牆無明顯滲水或發霉)

matching_result_list.evidence: Image displays a wall-mounted TV, a small refrigerator, and a cabinet, fulfilling the '起居區/小客廳' (Living area) requirement with '基本家電齊全' (Basic appliances complete).

extracted_feature.raw_description: 基本家電齊全(冰箱與電視已附), 收納中等(有單門衣櫃), 牆面簡潔(留白多可自行配置收納與書桌), 地板好整理(拋光瓷磚易清潔), 插座方便(電視附近已配置插座)

matching_result_list.evidence: This image provides a wide shot encompassing the sleeping area and the doorway to the bathroom, representing the '套房整體視角' (Overall studio view). The perspective suggests a slightly long layout.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 動線簡單(臥室區與衛浴一線直通), 空間略顯狹長(床與入口距離不大), 私密性一般(衛浴門直接對睡眠區), 地面平整(全室同一地磚好打掃), 採光一般(僅臥室端有窗戶)

matching_result_list.evidence: The image clearly features a washing machine and a large window in a spacious, tiled room, matching the '室內曬衣/工作陽台' (Utility balcony) description and '洗衣設備到位' (Washing equipment in place).

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光充足(長型窗戶引入自然光), 良好通風(窗戶大適合散味與晾衣), 洗衣設備到位(已有洗衣機), 空間寬敞(走道型陽台可加曬衣架或收納), 地磚耐用(適合濕區使用)

matching_result_list.evidence: This is a large, open outdoor space with a metal awning structure and an open view, definitively matching the '頂樓大露台' (Large rooftop terrace) description.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 超大戶外空間(可作休閒與多人活動), 半戶外遮雨棚(不怕日曬雨淋), 良好通風(開放式側邊利於空氣流通), 視野開闊(周邊无遮挡感), 適合曬衣/養寵物(空地多用途), 地面老舊可留意(磁磚縫明顯需注意積水與保養)
